summary: In a world where two men in close proximity will eventually draw guns, Rico "BULLET" Burke finds himself at a crossroads. Having long ago ruined his brilliant collegiate football career ... See full summary »
cast: Michael Paré|Kaela Dobkin|Raymond Serra|Austin Pendleton|Ron Holgate|Mark Hutchinson|Tony Cucci|Tie Domi|John Jordan|Richard Bachynsky Hoover|Nicole D'Or|Todd Baker

title: Men of Means
